definitions.definition: A person following the pursuits of civil life, especially one who is not an active member of the armed forces.
examples: Three civilians were apprehended by the soldiers and taken away in a military vehicle.

definitions.definition: A person who does not belong to a particular group or engage in a particular activity, an outsider .
examples: The bathroom was for employees only, so civilians weren't allowed to use it.

definitions.definition: A student of civil law at a university or college .
An employee of the civil service .

main_definition: A person following the pursuits of civil life, especially one who is not an active member of the armed forces.
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) A person who does not belong to a particular group or engage in a particular activity, an outsider .
A student of civil law at a university or college .
An employee of the civil service .
